name: The 7 Cents Deal
description:
The precious '7 lives' of kittens are contained in their bells... which they use to buy stuff! You work as a 'Catshier', give your customers the exact change or you'll have to pay with your own livebells!

**BEWARE!** Some client are willing to pay with their 7 lives. Because we don't want any casualties, please give back 7¢ when this happens.

Controls:

Your mouse.
